When the image sensor area of the mobile phone is certain, the higher the pixel value, the smaller the unit pixel area. The unit pixel area directly affects the amount of light entering. The smaller the unit pixel area, the less light entering the image sensor, and the captured photos will become dark and blurry; the lower the pixel value, the larger the unit pixel photosensitive area and the better the photosensitive performance. Good, so it has better performance in terms of high-sensitivity image quality and picture level of imaging.

choices: (A) Ituro ang mga salik na nakakaapekto sa epekto ng imaging ng mga mobile phone

Filipino.context: Kapag hinuhusgahan ang pag-andar ng camera ng isang mobile phone, naniniwala ang mga tao na mas mataas ang pixel ng mobile phone, mas maganda ang epekto ng camera. Ganito ba talaga? Mula sa prinsipyo ng imaging, ang laki ng halaga ng pixel ay magkakaroon ng tiyak na impluwensya sa nabuong imahe. Kapag tiyak ang image sensor area ng mobile phone, mas mataas ang pixel value, mas maliit ang unit pixel area. Direktang nakakaapekto ang unit pixel area sa dami ng pumapasok na liwanag. Kung mas maliit ang lugar ng pixel ng unit, mas kaunting liwanag ang pumapasok sa sensor ng imahe, at magiging madilim at malabo ang mga nakunan na larawan; mas mababa ang pixel value, mas malaki ang unit pixel photosensitive area at mas maganda ang photosensitive na performance. Mabuti, kaya ito ay may mas mahusay na pagganap sa mga tuntunin ng mataas na sensitivity na kalidad ng imahe at antas ng larawan ng imaging.

Spanish.answer: (A) Señale los factores que afectan el efecto de imagen de los teléfonos móviles.
choices: (A) Señale los factores que afectan el efecto de imagen de los teléfonos móviles.
(B) Introducir técnicas para mejorar el efecto de la fotografía con teléfonos móviles.
(C) Explica la definición de píxel y cómo mejorarlo.
(D) Revelar la relación entre la cantidad de luz entrante y el valor de píxel
Spanish.context: Al juzgar la función de la cámara de un teléfono móvil, la gente siempre cree intuitivamente que cuanto mayor sea el píxel del teléfono móvil, mejor será el efecto de la cámara. ¿Es este realmente el caso? Desde el principio de la imagen, el tamaño del valor del píxel tendrá cierta influencia en la imagen generada. Cuando el área del sensor de imagen del teléfono móvil es cierta, cuanto mayor sea el valor de píxel, menor será la unidad de área de píxel. El área unitaria de píxeles afecta directamente la cantidad de luz que ingresa. Cuanto más pequeña sea la unidad de área de píxeles, menos luz entrará en el sensor de imagen y las fotografías capturadas se volverán oscuras y borrosas; cuanto menor sea el valor de píxel, mayor será el área fotosensible por unidad de píxel y mejor será el rendimiento fotosensible. Bien, por lo que tiene un mejor rendimiento en términos de calidad de imagen de alta sensibilidad y nivel de imagen.

Chinese.answer: (A) 指出影响手机成像效果的因素
choices: (A) 指出影响手机成像效果的因素
(B) 介绍提高手机拍照效果的技巧
(C) 阐述像素的定义及其提升途径
(D) 揭示进光量与像素值间的关系
Chinese.context: 人们在评判手机拍照功能时，总是直观地认为手机像素越高，拍照效果越好。事实真的是这样吗？从成像原理来看，像素值的大小对生成的图像会产生一定的影响。当手机的图像传感器面积一定的时候，像素值越高，单位像素面积就越小。而单位像素面积又直接影响到进光量，单位像素面积越小，图像传感器上进光量就越少，拍摄出的照片就会变得灰暗模糊；像素值越低，单位像素感光面积大，感光性能更好，因此在成像的高感光画质以及画面层次等方面都有更好的表现。

Malay.answer: (A) Tunjukkan faktor yang mempengaruhi kesan pengimejan telefon bimbit
choices: (A) Tunjukkan faktor yang mempengaruhi kesan pengimejan telefon bimbit
(B) Perkenalkan teknik untuk meningkatkan kesan fotografi telefon bimbit
(C) Terangkan pentakrifan piksel dan cara memperbaikinya
(D) Dedahkan hubungan antara jumlah cahaya masuk dan nilai piksel
Malay.context: Apabila menilai fungsi kamera telefon bimbit, orang sentiasa percaya secara intuitif bahawa semakin tinggi piksel sebuah telefon bimbit, semakin baik kesan kameranya. Adakah ini benar? Daripada prinsip pengimejan, saiz nilai piksel akan mempunyai pengaruh tertentu terhadap imej yang dihasilkan. Apabila kawasan penderia imej telefon bimbit pasti, semakin tinggi nilai piksel, semakin kecil kawasan satu piksel unit. Kawasan piksel unit mempengaruhi jumlah cahaya yang masuk secara langsung. Semakin kecil kawasan piksel unit, semakin kurang cahaya yang memasuki penderia imej, dan foto yang ditangkap akan menjadi gelap dan kabur; semakin rendah nilai piksel, semakin besar kawasan fotosensitif piksel unit dan semakin baik prestasi fotosensitif. Bagus, jadi ia mempunyai prestasi yang lebih baik dari segi kualiti imej kepekaan tinggi dan tahap pengimejan gambar.

Please answer the following multiple-choice question by selecting the correct option.

Context:
Không giỏi ăn nói với mọi người, thường dễ gây ra tranh chấp hoặc hiểu lầm. Yêu cầu của mỗi người trong việc tương tác với người khác là khác nhau và khả năng thể hiện bản thân cũng như hiểu người khác của họ cũng khác nhau ở mỗi người.

Question:
Điều nào sau đây là lập luận được hỗ trợ trực tiếp bởi đoạn này?

Choices:
(A) Mặc dù mọi người đều sẵn sàng nói chuyện với người khác nhưng thật khó để hiểu nhau
(B) Vì hai bên có mục đích và yêu cầu khác nhau nên khó có thể hiểu được ý nghĩa thực sự của nhau
(C) Không giỏi ăn nói là một trong những nguyên nhân gây ra tranh chấp, hiểu lầm
(D) Diễn đạt ý nghĩa của mình dễ hơn là hiểu ý nghĩa của người khác

Answer:
Vietnamese.model_prediction:
**C. Không giỏi ăn nói là một trong những nguyên nhân gây ra tranh chấp, hiểu lầm**

Đoạn văn khẳng định rằng "Không giỏi ăn nói với mọi người, thường dễ gây ra tranh chấp hoặc hiểu lầm". Điều này là lập luận được hỗ trợ trực tiếp bởi đoạn văn, vì nó nói rằng khó khăn để hiểu nhau là một trong những nguyên nhân gây ra tranh chấp.

choices: (A) Efek perlindungan petir terhadap bumi
(B) Mekanisme pembentukan petir
(C) Bahaya sinar kosmik bagi umat manusia
(D) Kontribusi Ozon bagi umat manusia
Indonesian.context: Jika tidak ada petir, manusia akan kehilangan pembersih yang bekerja keras. Saat petir menyambar, sebagian oksigen di atmosfer tereksitasi menjadi ozon. Ozon yang tipis tidak hanya tidak berbau, tetapi juga menyerap sebagian besar sinar kosmik, sehingga melindungi organisme di permukaan bumi dari radiasi ultraviolet yang berlebihan. Suhu tinggi yang dihasilkan dalam proses sambaran petir dapat membunuh lebih dari 90% bakteri dan mikroorganisme di atmosfer, sehingga menjadikan udara lebih murni, segar, dan nyaman.

English.answer: (A) The protective effect of lightning on the earth
choices: (A) The protective effect of lightning on the earth
(B) Mechanism of lightning formation
(C) Harm of cosmic rays to mankind
(D) Ozone's contribution to mankind
English.context: If there is no lightning, human beings will lose a hard-working cleaner. When lightning works, part of the oxygen in the atmosphere is excited into ozone. The thin ozone not only does not smell, but also absorbs most of the cosmic rays, so as to protect the organisms on the earth's surface from excessive ultraviolet radiation. The high temperature generated in the process of lightning can kill more than 90% of the bacteria and microorganisms in the atmosphere, This makes the air more pure, fresh and pleasant.
English.question: This paragraph mainly introduces that:
English.model_input:
Please answer the following multiple-choice question by selecting the correct option.

Context:
If there is no lightning, human beings will lose a hard-working cleaner. When lightning works, part of the oxygen in the atmosphere is excited into ozone. The thin ozone not only does not smell, but also absorbs most of the cosmic rays, so as to protect the organisms on the earth's surface from excessive ultraviolet radiation. The high temperature generated in the process of lightning can kill more than 90% of the bacteria and microorganisms in the atmosphere, This makes the air more pure, fresh and pleasant.

Question:
This paragraph mainly introduces that:

Choices:
(A) The protective effect of lightning on the earth
(B) Mechanism of lightning formation
(C) Harm of cosmic rays to mankind
(D) Ozone's contribution to mankind

Answer:
English.model_prediction:
The correct answer is (A) The protective effect of lightning on the earth.

The paragraph emphasizes the protective role of lightning in purifying the air by absorbing cosmic rays and protecting the organisms on Earth from excessive ultraviolet radiation.

Spanish.answer: (A) El efecto protector de los rayos sobre la tierra.
choices: (A) El efecto protector de los rayos sobre la tierra.
(B) Mecanismo de formación de rayos.
(C) Daño de los rayos cósmicos a la humanidad.
(D) La contribución del ozono a la humanidad
Spanish.context: Si no hay rayos, los seres humanos perderemos a un limpiador que trabaja duro. Cuando los rayos actúan, parte del oxígeno de la atmósfera se transforma en ozono. La fina capa de ozono no sólo no huele, sino que también absorbe la mayoría de los rayos cósmicos, para proteger a los organismos de la superficie terrestre de la excesiva radiación ultravioleta. La alta temperatura generada en el proceso de los rayos puede matar más del 90% de las bacterias y microorganismos de la atmósfera, esto hace que el aire sea más puro, fresco y agradable.

Spanish.answer: (A) La tecnología de la información ha cambiado la forma de acumulación y almacenamiento de conocimiento en el pasado.

Spanish.context: La búsqueda de información en línea, en lugar del almacenamiento enciclopédico de conocimientos, se está convirtiendo en la norma de la producción de conocimientos. El intento anterior de almacenar conocimientos en el cerebro a través de la memoria individual ha sido derrotado frente a Internet, una forma de almacenamiento ilimitado de información, incluida la computación en la nube. Con la externalización de la sustitución y extracción de la capacidad de la memoria humana por Internet, las personas ya no son propietarias del conocimiento puro, sino creadoras y poseedoras de nuevos conocimientos; toda acumulación de conocimientos clásicos está preparada para la creación y posesión de nuevos conocimientos.

English.answer: (B) Most researchers in climatology have substantial motive to find evidence that would discredit the global warming hypothesis.
choices: (A) Scientists who are skeptical about global warming have not offered any alternative hypotheses to explain climatological data.
(B) Most researchers in climatology have substantial motive to find evidence that would discredit the global warming hypothesis.
(C) There is evidence that conclusively shows that the global warming hypothesis is true.
(D) Research in global warming is primarily driven by a desire for recognition in the scientific community.
English.context: Modern science is built on the process of posing hypotheses and testing them against observations -- in essence, attempting to show that the hypotheses are incorrect. Nothing brings more recognition than overthrowing conventional wisdom. It is accordingly unsurprising that some scientists are skeptical of the widely accepted predictions of global warming. What is instead remarkable is that with hundreds of researchers striving to make breakthroughs in climatology, very few find evidence that global warming is unlikely.

One study involved 80 young people aged 13 to 25 with early symptoms of schizophrenia. Therefore, the researchers concluded that taking fish oil tablets may help prevent schizophrenia in adolescents.

Question:

(D) Fish oil tablets have been tried in adults with schizophrenia, but experiments have found no effect.

Answer:
English.model_prediction: The correct answer is (C) Subjects were given fish oil tablets for a shorter period of time. It did not produce a stable and significant effect.

Kelompok subjek pertama meminum lima cangkir kopi atau lebih sehari, dan subjek kelompok kedua tidak pernah minum kopi. Setelah jangka waktu tertentu, ditemukan bahwa proporsi penyakit jantung pada kelompok subjek pertama secara signifikan lebih tinggi dibandingkan pada kelompok kedua. English.answer: (B) During the study period, the daily amount of exercise of the first group of subjects was much less than that of the second group of subjects
choices: (A) Some of the subjects in the first group drank 10 cups of coffee a day

(D) The study found that people who drank two cups of coffee a day had no effect on heart function
English.context: Many medical experts have suggested that excessive coffee drinking is harmful to health. In order to verify the impact of excessive coffee drinking on the heart, researchers selected two groups of subjects. The first group of subjects drank five or more cups of coffee a day, and the second group of subjects never drank coffee. After a period of time, it was found that the proportion of heart disease in the first group of subjects was significantly higher than that in the second group. Therefore, The researchers concluded that drinking too much coffee increased the risk of heart disease.

Spanish.answer: (B) Durante el período de estudio, la cantidad diaria de ejercicio del primer grupo de sujetos fue mucho menor que la del segundo grupo de sujetos.
choices: (A) Algunos de los sujetos del primer grupo bebían 10 tazas de café al día.
(B) Durante el período de estudio, la cantidad diaria de ejercicio del primer grupo de sujetos fue mucho menor que la del segundo grupo de sujetos.
(C) Además de afectar la función cardíaca, la cafeína contenida en el café también causa ansiedad fácilmente.
(D) El estudio encontró que las personas que bebían dos tazas de café al día no tenían ningún efecto sobre la función cardíaca
Spanish.context: Muchos expertos médicos han sugerido que el consumo excesivo de café es perjudicial para la salud. Para verificar el impacto del consumo excesivo de café en el corazón, los investigadores seleccionaron dos grupos de sujetos. El primer grupo de sujetos bebía cinco o más tazas de café al día y el segundo grupo de sujetos nunca bebía café. Después de un tiempo, se descubrió que la proporción de enfermedades cardíacas en el primer grupo de sujetos era significativamente mayor que en el segundo grupo. Por tanto, los investigadores concluyeron que beber demasiado café aumentaba el riesgo de sufrir enfermedades cardíacas.

Chinese.context: 很多医学者专家提出过量饮用咖啡对健康有害.为验证过量饮用咖啡对心脏的影响,研究人员选取了两组被试者.第一组被试者每天饮用5杯或5杯以上咖啡,第二组被试者从不饮用咖啡.一段时间后发现,第一组被试者中患心脏病的比例明显高于第二组被试者.因此,研究人员得出结论,过量饮用咖啡增加心脏病的风险.

很多医学者专家提出过量饮用咖啡对健康有害.为验证过量饮用咖啡对心脏的影响,研究人员选取了两组被试者.第一组被试者每天饮用5杯或5杯以上咖啡,第二组被试者从不饮用咖啡.一段时间后发现,第一组被试者中患心脏病的比例明显高于第二组被试者.因此,研究人员得出结论,过量饮用咖啡增加心脏病的风险.

Question:
以下哪项如果为真,最能质疑上述论证？

Choices:
(A) 第一组被试者中部分人每日饮用10杯咖啡
(B) 在研究期间,第一组被试者每日的运动量大大小于第二组被试者
(C) 除影响心脏功能外,咖啡中所含的咖啡因还易引发焦虑症
(D) 研究发现,每日饮用2杯咖啡的人心脏功能未受影响

Answer:
Chinese.model_prediction:
The correct answer is (A) first group of people who drink 10 cups of coffee daily.

Vietnamese.context: Nhiều chuyên gia y tế cho rằng uống quá nhiều cà phê có hại cho sức khỏe. Nhóm đối tượng đầu tiên uống năm tách cà phê trở lên mỗi ngày và nhóm đối tượng thứ hai không bao giờ uống cà phê. Sau một thời gian, người ta nhận thấy tỷ lệ mắc bệnh tim ở nhóm đối tượng đầu tiên cao hơn đáng kể so với nhóm thứ hai. Vì vậy, các nhà nghiên cứu kết luận rằng uống quá nhiều cà phê làm tăng nguy cơ mắc bệnh tim.
